title.native: 老後に備えて異世界で８万枚の金貨を貯めます
title.romaji: Rougo ni Sonaete Isekai de 8-manmai no Kinka wo Tamemasu
title.english: Saving 80,000 Gold in Another World for My Retirement

description:
Mitsuha is an 18-year-old girl who’s often mistaken for a middle schooler due to her childlike face and small stature. The story begins when she loses her parents and her older brother at the same time in an accident and ends up all alone in the world.  

She fails her university entrance exams due to the shock of losing her family. There are people who are after her parents’ insurance money. She doesn’t know whether she should go to college or start working. There are also lots of expenses to worry about, including living expenses and the cost of maintaining the house.   

One day, as she worries about how she'll survive, she’s given the “World Jumping” ability by a mysterious being that allows her to go back and forth between “this world” and an “isekai”! Now that she has this ability, she comes up with a plan for the future in which she saves 1 billion yen in each world for a total of 2 billion yen (80,000 gold coins)! 

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: เก็บเงินต่างโลก 8 หมื่นเหรียญ ไว้ใช้ยามเกษียณไงคะ
J'épargne 80 000 pièces d'or dans un autre monde pour ma retraite
为了养老金去异世界存八万金
Коплю 80 тысяч золотых в другом мире на пенсию

tags.name: Economics
tags.description: Centers around the field of economics.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Food
tags.description: Centers around cooking or food appraisal.

tags.name: Guns
tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Military
tags.description: Centered around the life and activities of military personnel.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Language Barrier
tags.description: A barrier to communication between people who are unable to speak a common language.

tags.name: Goblin
tags.description: A goblin is a monstrous creature from European folklore. They are almost always small and grotesque, mischievous or outright malicious, and greedy. Sometimes with magical abilities.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

node.description:
[Syosetu](http://mypage.syosetu.com/79012/)

A Japanese writer from the Kansai region.

Started writing on Shousetsuka ni Narou at November 2nd 2015 when published the first chapter of [Rougo ni Sonaete Isekai de 8-manmai no Kinka wo Tamemasu](https://anilist.co/manga/101716/). Despite being from the Kansai, after visiting every part of Japan, decided to settle on the Kantou Region. Have as hobbies amateur radio and small boating (having licenses for both). Also have a weather forecaster license.

__Height:__ 147cm
__Agency:__ Amuse

[Profile (Amuse)](https://www.amuse.co.jp/artist/A8884/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaor1n_n) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/maedakaori_official) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpErCU3g3P5cN3lMNfcwYEw)

__Non-anime roles:__
- Poli - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Lingsha - Honkai: Star Rail (VG)
Youhei Takami is a magazine editor.
**Masayuki Nishide** is a Japanese producer and animation planner, who works for the Asahi Broadcasting Corporation (ABC).
Chief Content Officer (チーフ・コンテンツ・オフィサー) at [Crunchyroll](https://anilist.co/studio/6421).
